column2: Zane is my favorite ninja I picked this up as an impulse buy.

column1: The build is simple and took me 2-3 minutes to build. The build itself is good
column2: and I especially like the side build because of the TWO Ice&nbsp

column1: The parts are the main reason I bought this. A set of four
column2: shurikens finally appear in silver and I like the inclusion&nbsp
column3: of the Aeroblades and trans light blue snowflake are great. There is also a printed 2x2 round tile with a Zanes snowflake symbol.

column2: The minifigure included is Spinjitzu Master Zane and I think he is mediocre. He is great if
column3: you want someone to look like they have been blasted with ice.

column1: It is very playable and is fun but I recommend having two spinners and two people. Also, it can leave scuff marks and especially on this white spinner.
If you collect Zane or want a spinner, I recommend having this. If not then pass on it because it is not worth it.
